This update adds GitHub Action workflow, python-package.yml. The
workflow tests whther Python packages necessary for Comptox AI are
installed sucessfully without any conflicts.

The update modifies README.md to reflect changes in workflow status
badge.

The update adds workflow templates.

The update modifies setup.py to resolve pandas version conflict.

The update modifies .gitignore to add "build" to the ignore list.

Closes-Bug #42
